name: Natural Super Hydration Face Moisturizer 1.7oz
description: Give your skin the intense hydration it craves with the All Natural Super Hydration Face Moisturizer. The lightweight formula is enriched with essential vitamins, antioxidants and anti-inflammatories that nourish and protect the skin from environmental aggressors. Featuring powerful ingredients like Olive Squalane, Aloe Vera Leaf, and MSM that soothe, detoxify and calm the skin, this moisturizer will leave your skin feeling replenished and glowing. Apply a quarter of a pump in patting (never rubbing) motions on face, neck and decolletage to provide all day superior hydration. Suitable for all skin types. Ingredients: Water, Aloe Vera Whole Leaf Juice, Shea Butter, Fractionated Coconut Oil, Olive Squalane, Vegetable Glycerin, Natural Vegetable Emulsifying Wax, Vegetable Stearic Acid, DL Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B), Safflower Oil, MSM, Green Tea Extract, Silver Dihydrogen Citrate
